I'm crossposting this from addon support since that's probably not the best forum for this question -

Would it be within the scope of current mod development capability to "abstract" objects in service modules, cargo bays, fairings etc that don't need to be physically simulated or rendered? So that you'd just add the mass of your payload to the cargo bay part, and you'd only unpack the cargo once you open the doors or jettison the fairings or whatever.

I suppose the 'container' part could also assume some of the behavior of its contents - so you could for example add some batteries and small tanks to a service module part, which would update its mass and resource storage accordingly without actually adding the new parts (so like modular fuels, except even more modular).

I'd be interested in any experienced modder's input on the feasibility of something like this.
